message: This is a rare opportunity to get a product that is almost certain to be worth $2000000 to you. The probability of it being high-quality is 33.33%. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000, which is a steal considering the potential upside. I'm only offering this deal to you because I value our relationship and trust your business acumen. What do you say? Will you take the chance?
I appreciate your offer, but given the 66.67% chance of the product being low-quality, I'm not willing to take the risk at this price point.
